Posts.Content: Apr 23, 2014 10:15PM LGB wrote: Simplya:    You are absolutely right.  The company has been asked to correct the misleading Tribute button / page numerous times, and refuses.  What's that about?!?    There is no question (search comments on internet!) that CB tricks unaware, generous, caring people.   I saw this recently on a friend's son's CB website, a comment made by someone who made a tribute donation: "From one basketball family to another." I wanted to cry.  MY friend needs this financial help, not a nonprofit whose only task is "managing a website." (Yeah, well does that really take $8M a year, which is what it receives?)    I appreciate it serves a need, but a FAR better and honest website is www.lotsahelpinghands.org.  No scams.    Please steer people to this.
